Art. 4.58. 
Liquidation of a vacant succession 
Where, after the expiry of the time limits for making an inventory and for deliberation, there is no person claiming an estate, there is no known heir or the known successors have renounced it, the estate is deemed to be vacant.
The curator appointed by the family court, in accordance with article 1228 of the Code judiciaire, is required to have the state of the succession established by an inventory.
He administers the succession. The provisions of chapter 4 relating to both the realisation of the assets and the payment of the liabilities by the beneficiary heir are applicable.
